name: Rock Paper Scissors The Card Game
name_original: Rock Paper Scissors The Card Game
description:
What if Rock Paper Scissors was a card game? 

That's what I asked myself when I decided to make a something small to motivate and remind myself that I can finish the things I start. 

Play your cards! See your opponent's cards!? Have the ability to Swap the order of your cards and change fate?!?! But wait... your opponent can do the same??

After Word:

There isn't really anything exciting or explosive here - just a small, simple and chill game were you play rock paper scissors against the AI in card form (with lofi music!). 

Admittedly, this would be a much better concept for a multiplayer game where the players are able to communicate with each other to be able to use the power of lies and deceit. 

Will I add more to the game in the future? Maybe, there is a lot I can do with it with how open the concept is.

Possible Future Improvements: 

  • Be able to drag and drop cards to play them
  • Cards with unique abilities to open up deck building
  • More impactful assets
  • Online multiplayer with text and or voice communication 
  • Story????
